name: The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff
storyline:
Help spruce up the places where Sims spend most of their time and redesign your Sims lives' essential living areas into the most luxurious of spaces. Transform the bathroom with charming claw-foot bathtubs and redesign the kitchen with sleek appliances on granite countertops. Be your Sims' personal interior designer!

Players can add some modern pizzazz to their cooking area by installing fancy granite countertops and sleek appliances, or they can go the rustic route with wrought iron stoves and natural wood cabinets. Lavatory flourishes include claw-foot tubs, glass showers, basin sinks, sectional mirrors, designer rugs, and tile flooring. Gamers can also outfit their Sims with relevant clothing like bathrobes and cooking aprons.
summary: Redesign your kitchen as you upgrade it with sleek appliances on granite counter tops or romantic natural wood cabinets next to wrought iron stoves with The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff. Outfit your Sims in the perfect clothes and accessories to enjoy their lavish new rooms, from sumptuous spa robes to designer cooking aprons. Be your Sims' personal interior designer!
